body:
This video is basically about me finding a pretty funny easter egg on Nordic Holiday, practically on the same day it was released. It was a new map and I totally was not expecting to find it, so it was really funny when I found it. I was skyping sfkwww and JKawesome at the time. Check out our reactions, and if you haven't already found it, the easteregg. (Sorry if the map isn't still there for you to check out on nebula) :D 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PF5Ltw3U8xI
